code: import React from"react";import{Button,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import"./DeletePopup.css";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DeletePopup(_ref){let{setDeleteWindow,setDeleteConfirm,item:{type,details}}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"delete-popup",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[type==="product"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Delete ",details.brand," ",details.name,"?"]}),type==="store"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Delete ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:details.name})," Store?"]}),type==="stock"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Delete ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:details.storeName})," Stock?"]}),type==="account"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Delete Account?"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"btn-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn mb-1",onClick:()=>{setDeleteConfirm(type);},children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn",onClick:()=>{setDeleteWindow(false);},children:"No"})]})]})});}export default DeletePopup;
